message.name: ERR_ACTIONPLAN_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ACTIONPLAN_FV_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ACTIONPLAN_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This action plan has already been canceled.
This action plan has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ACTIONPLAN_MODIFY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Action Plan cannot be modified as it is already canceled.
Action Plan cannot be modified as it is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ACTIONPLAN_DATES_EMPTY
message.locale: An expected end date, a review date or actual end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUTCOME_ENDDATE
message.locale: An outcome must be selected if an actual end date is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ENDDATE_OUTCOME
message.locale: An actual end date must be entered if an outcome is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_STARTDATE_EXPECTEDENDDATE
message.locale: The expected end date must not be before the start date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_STARTDATE_REVIEWDATE
message.locale: The review date must not be before the start date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_STARTDATE_ACTUALENDDATE
message.locale: The actual end date must not be before the start date.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ACTIONPLAN_ACTUAL_END_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_BEFORE_ACTION_ACTUAL_END_DATE
message.locale: The Actual End Date, %1s, of an Action Plan must be on or after the Actual End Date of any of the Actions.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ACTUALENDDATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_TODAY
message.locale: The actual end date must be today or earlier.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SITUATION_LINKED_TO_ACTION
message.locale: The Situation cannot be canceled as it has associated Actions.
The Situation cannot be cancelled as it has associated Actions.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ACTION_LINKED_TO_SITUATION
message.locale: The Action cannot be canceled as it has associated Situations.
The Action cannot be cancelled as it has associated Situations.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SITUATION_LINKED_TO_ALLEGATION
message.locale: The Situation cannot be canceled as it has associated Allegations.
The Situation cannot be cancelled as it has associated Allegations.

message.name: ERR_SITUATION_MODIFY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Situation cannot be modified as it is already canceled.
Situation cannot be modified as it is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SITUATION_ACTUAL_DATE_CANNOT_BE_AFTER_ACTIONPLAN_END_DATE
message.locale: The Actual End Date of the Situation cannot be later than the Actual End Date of the Action Plan.
The Actual End Date of the Situation cannot be later than the Actual End Date of the Action Plan.

message.name: ERR_SITUATION_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This situation has already been canceled.
This situation has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ASSOCIATE_TO_ACTION_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Situations may not be associated to the action, as the action has been canceled.
Situations may not be associated to the action, as the action has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ASSOCIATE_TO_SITUATION_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Actions may not be associated to the situation, as the situation has been canceled.
Actions may not be associated to the situation, as the situation has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ACTIONPLAN_ADD_ACTION_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Action cannot be added as the Action Plan has been cancelled.
The Action cannot be added as the Action Plan has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ACTIONPLAN_ADD_SITUATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Situation cannot be added as the Action Plan has been cancelled.
The Situation cannot be added as the Action Plan has been cancelled.
